document.full_text: top officials from the world's two largest economies meet next week to try to tackle irritants in their relations, a task that will only grow tougher as domestic politics seize the stage next year.
document.title: u.s. and china race political calendar to curb irritants
lines_and_colors: top officials from the world's two largest economies meet next week to try to tackle irritants in their relations, a task that will only grow tougher as domestic politics seize the stage next year.
